entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • wasm System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ToString() returns different string for some types in public field compare to desktop #88637
  • Faster Object.GetType #88631
    Future
  • [coreclr] calling a constructor via an UnmanagedCallersOnly UnsafeAccessor crashes #88629
  • Frozen collection tests fail on NativeAOT #88628
  • Android: AOT compiler fails in directory named `BuildAot AndÜmläüts` #88625
  • Update trimming tests to use live-built ILLink.Targets logic #88624
  • CHECK: expected string not found in input #88622
  • Assertion failed 'distVal <= CALL_DIST_MAX_POS' in 'CseTest.Test_Main:TestEntryPoint():int' during 'Emit code' #88621
  • jit-cfg pipline gc stress failure on linux x64 #88618
  • Source Generated interop should warn when a user puts `[OutAttribute]` on a `string` and suggest `[Out] char[]` #88617
  • Fuzzlyn failure on linux arm64 #88616
  • System.IO.Directory invalid parsing for directorie names ending with a dot #88615
  • [wasm] Perf benchmark failures - `System.Text.Json` serializer related failures #88610
    8.0.0
  • Move BackgroundService implementation from StartAsync to the new StartedAsync #88605
  • Validate StartAsync() exception semantics for Starting, Start, Started #88603
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: exportable static fields support #88598
  • InMemoryDirectoryInfo does not work with absolute paths on Windows #88596
  • [HTTP/2] `HttpClient` never sends GOAWAY frame #88593
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce asynchronous version of RateLimiter.GetStatistics #88592
  • Port System.Linq documentation from .NET 8.0 APIs #88589
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Cloud documentation from .NET 8.0 APIs #88588
    8.0.0
  • behavior of [:XX:] inside a regex range has changed #88587
  • Test failure readytorun/GenericCycleDetection/Depth3Test/Depth3Test.sh #88586
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/regressions/13662/13662-b/13662-b.cmd #88585
  • Test failure readytorun/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/CpuId_R2R_Avx/CpuId_R2R_Avx.sh #88582
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/X86Base/CpuId_r/X86_CpuId_r.dll #88581
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector512Tests.Vector512IsHardwareAcceleratedTest #88580
  • Test failure Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.ProduceDiagnosticFromOtherAssemblyTest #88579
  • Port System.Threading documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88578
  • Port System.Text.Json documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88577
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Text documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88576
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Security documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88575
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Runtime.Intrinsics documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88574
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Runtime.InteropServices documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88573
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Reflection documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88571
    8.0.0
  • Port System.Numerics documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88570
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Generator does not warn on invalid uses of GeneratedComClassAttribute #87137
  • Can't call NativeLibrary.GetExport with RTLD_DEFAULT on Linux #71881
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm] Profiled AOT fails on System.IO invocations #87856
  • WebAssembly Blazor Breakpoint stopping after it is removed. #72663
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Collections.Tests Unimplemented opcode 2428 .i2 #85145
    8.0.0
  • Blazor - Ternary operator crashes #85597
  • Scheduled tasks stop working after 2023.04.14 1:41:36 UTC #85473
    7.0.x
  • [WASM] Blazor Application crashes after 15 minutes #85774
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][7.0] Blazor Wasm debugger not working anymore #87407
    7.0.x
  • Test failure baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_QuickJitForLoopsOn/BasicTest_QuickJitForLoopsOn.sh #88583
    8.0.0
  • Build break in Mono Android extra-platforms #88344
    8.0.0
  • Create experimental wasi-wasm runtime pack workloads #80786
    8.0.0
  • Fix the boxing when using the LoggerMessage.Define is used and values are converted ToString #50768
    Future
  • can't dotnet run x86 at x64 on net8 #88283
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/processinfo3/processinfo3/processinfo3.sh #88225
    8.0.0
  • SslStream can get stuck on large transfers with TLS 1.3 #88495
    8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] "Arg storage type not yet supported" on specific P/Invoke method signature #82976
  • Integrating .NET 8 WebAssembly project into the Angular app #88545
  • Proxy authentication not recognized in macOS #86322
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] ObjectWriter for MacOS should be built and published from the Main branch #87644
    8.0.0
  • Infra improvements for Helix #68176
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR tests build fails with `skipmanaged` option #85170
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline completely broken #88534
    8.0.0
  • Strange behaviur when registering Open Generics inside DI container #88192
  • Inspecting private members of RegistryKey in debugger causes it to be disposed #88556
  • why Newtonsoft.Json too big when build native aot #88600
  • Example of building and testing libraries doesn't work #87367
  • [browser] multiple dotnet runtimes on the same page #87280
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.Matrix4x4Tests.Matrix4x4CreateShadowTest02 #83316
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] GC events don't get logged on Linux #87445
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2218291 #88636
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix hotreload tests #88635
    area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: [Mono] Add dotnet-gcdump support. #88634
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [NativeAOT] A few scalability fixes for the fat Lock #88633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix regex for helix retries when chrome fails to launch #88632
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add more docs for new COM source generator types #88627
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] UnsafeAccessorAttribute non-generic support for field #88626
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Ensure that the CpuId tests set preferredVectorByteLength to a non-zero value #88623
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update to 22.04 queues #88619
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • wrap exceptions from callbacks in QuicError.CallbackError #88614
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Fix options source gen with non-accessible validation attributes #88613
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Do not use `RhGetCodeTarget` in delegate equality #88611
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable STJ reflection by default on AOT publish #88609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Enable finalizer events for EventPipe #88604
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add coreclr_shutdown to mono #88594
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove stub of special treatment for POSIX char ranges #88590
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix Position and Seek for MemoryStream with custom origin #88572
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • [mono] Precompute the CallInfo structure used by the mono_arch_..nati… #88369
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][aot] Avoid prefer-ing gsharedvt versions of AsyncMethodBuilder… #87990
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow (#86508) #87339
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.10
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging][wasm] CI: Fix EAT/AOT tests build #87546
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Work around for Android builds using GCC for cross compiler native tools build #88345
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Disable failing HotReload tests #88630
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reduce boxing in logging #88560
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0-staging] Allow GetILFunctionBody for dynamic methods #87598
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.10
  • [release/7.0-staging][wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance #88602
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add C library detection to processinfo3 test #88260
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Revert Deflater/Inflater changes around SafeHandle initialization #88153
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Update PackedSimd API #88595
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • [mono][interp] Add support for missing argument storage type on arm64 #88606
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #88336
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.11
  • [release/6.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #88351
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.21
  • fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated with NegotiateClientCertificateAsync #88488
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix CoreCLR tests build with skipmanaged option #88321
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix processing of TLS renegotiation #88511
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix crash happening due to invalid pointer to free() #86868
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Missing symbol crash fix #86864
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [libs][Unix][perf] Lazily initialize TimeZoneInfo names and order GetSystemTimeZones by Ids #88368
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Convert RegistryKey.SystemKeyHandle to method #88591
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2217623 #88506
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix example of building a library. #87398
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Ensure that NI_Vector_Dot is always handled as TYP_SIMD #88447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Internalize assetUniqueQuery as modulesUniqueQuery #88329
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] [jiterp] Use wasm if opcode for null checks and conditional branches #88114
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Disable Inline TLS field access on RISC-V #88584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix missing GC events on non-Windows for nativeaot #88282
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter thread safety infrastructure #88279
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not say the wrong default behavior for blittable arrays in ComInterfaceGenerator warning #88212
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation (#68835) #87143
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.10

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

  • Add some xml comments #88433
    area-Meta

    area-System.Linq.Expressions

  • Mark final types as exact #88163
